subject: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Beneficiary,
 
We have deposited your funds valued at $4.8000.00. through    
Bank transfer department after our final meeting Today to transfer to you
contact Bank transfer department director Mr Kennedy Uzoka,
He will give you the instruction how you will be
receive your total fund via online transfer
send him your full Bank information to avoid wrong transfer such as,
Receiver's Name__
Address: ____
Country: ____
Phone Number: ___
Confirm your Bank details_
Your ID
-----------
Mr Kennedy Uzoka
Best Regards Dr. UBA

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your message. I'm thrilled to hear about the funds! It's always exciting to receive unexpected news like this.

I would love to get in touch with Mr. Kennedy Uzoka as you suggested. However, could you please provide me with his contact details? An email address or a phone number would be really helpful.

Also, could you kindly explain a bit more about the process of receiving these funds via online transfer? I'm not very familiar with it and would appreciate some guidance.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Rosalina
